00025 include_once ('core/varia.functions.php');
00026 include_once ('core/usermanager.class.php');
00027 class userManagerTest extends PHPUnit2_Framework_TestCase {
00028         var $userManager;
00029         var $db;
00030 
00031         function setUp () {
00032                 global $dbModule;
00033                 $this->db = $dbModule;
00034                 $this->userManager = new userManager ($this->db);
00035         }
00036         
00037         function testEmpty () {
00038                 $result = $this->userManager->getAllUsersID ();
00039                 if (! isError ($result)) {
00040                         foreach ($result as $ID) {
00041                                 $user = new user ($this->db, $this->userManager->getAllOptionsForUser ());
00042                                 $user->initFromDatabaseID ($ID);
00043                                 $r = $this->userManager->removeUserFromDatabase ($user);
00044                                 if (isError ($r)) {
00045                                         $this->fail ($r);
00046                                 }
00047                         }
00048                         $this->assertEquals (0, count ($this->userManager->getAllUsersID ()));
00049                 } else {
00050                         $this->fail ($result);
00051                 }
00052         }
00053         
00054         function testLoginIsRegistered () {
00055                 $result = $this->userManager->loginIsRegistered ('NOTEXISTINGONE');
00056                 $this->assertEquals (false, $result);
00057         }       
00058         
00059         function testEmailIsRegistered () {
00060                 $result = $this->userManager->emailIsRegistered ('NOTEXISTINGONE');
00061                 $this->assertEquals (false, $result);
00062         }
00063         
00064         function testAddUserToDatabase () {
00065                 $user = $this->userManager->newUser ();
00066                 if (isError ($user)) {
00067                         $this->fail ($user);
00068                 }
00069                 $a = array ();
00070                 $a['login'] = 'THELOGIN';
00071                 $a['email'] = 'THEEMAIL';
00072                 $user->initFromArray ($a);
00073                 $result = $this->userManager->addUserToDatabase ($user);
00074                 $this->assertEquals (null, $result);
00075                 $loginExists = $this->userManager->loginIsRegistered ('THELOGIN');
00076                 $this->assertEquals (true, $loginExists);       
00077                 $emailExists = $this->userManager->emailIsRegistered ('THEEMAIL');
00078                 $this->assertEquals (true, $emailExists);
00079         }
00080         
00081         function testAddOptionForUser () {
00082                 $oldAllOptions = $this->userManager->getAllOptionsForUser ();
00083                 $oldAllOptions['preName'] = null;
00084                 $r = $this->userManager->addOptionToUser ('preName', 'varchar (255)');
00085                 $this->assertEquals (null, $r);
00086                 $newAllOptions = $this->userManager->getAllOptionsForUser ();
00087                 $this->assertEquals ($oldAllOptions, $newAllOptions);
00088         }
00089 }
